title: Get started with Operations Orchestration
content:
Operations Orchestration (OO) Containerized is a capability that enables seamless automation and orchestration of repeatable IT operations across teams, tools, and environments.

The capability contains the following functional components:

  • OO Central with an Internal OO Remote Action Service (RAS) - These components are available when you install OO Containerized. 

    OO Containerized can be installed on the following platforms:

    • On-premises: Install on physical or virtual machines. See Install OO on-premises.
    • Public cloud: Install on a public cloud–Amazon Web Services (AWS) with EKS, or Microsoft Azure with AKS. See  Install OO on EKS and Install OO on AKS.

  • OO Workflow Designer - You need to install this separately on an on-premises environment using a standalone installer.
  • External RAS - You need to install this separately on an on-premises environment using a standalone installer.

Together, the components of OO enable you to manage various services and devices across the organization and across their life cycle.
